page.title: 18ST.MARY'S -MAGDALEN LAVER
page.content: THE CHURCH OF ST.MARY,MAGDALEN LAVER dates from the early 12th.century & features subsequent addtions through to the 16th.century when the tower was built. St. Mary's is one of a declining number of rural churches still in operation although the pattern of its life has had to make many adjustments. The congregation is largely local & small. The present rector feels that the combined factors of population movement & changing lifestyles have contributed most to the decline of rural church life: once seen as the core of rural communities.The rate of change has accelerated over the last 40 years.
